settings.text:
Since 2017, we've been designing premium apparel and accessories, roasting and serving great specialty coffee and championing the free spirits of the world. Those who rebel against conformity. Those who break the mould. Those for which new moulds must be cast.

We're on one helluva ride. Come with us.

settings.video_title: Steeltown Garage - The House of Free Spirits Hamilton

settings.title: Origins
settings.desc:
We started out in the summer of 2017 just making graphic tees and snapbacks. But the demand for Steeltown stuff became too intense to ignore.

So we got to work and started looking at Steeltown Garage Co. as a fully-fledged lifestyle and clothing brand.

Today we're busy designing and manufacturing quality apparel with a focus on heritage construction and rugged fabrics that are built to withstand the abuse of post-modern life.

From chain-stitched car club jackets to heavyweight cotton shirts, we're making stuff that we're proud to wear and sell.

settings.title: Our cafe
settings.desc:
Inside the shop we've got a coffee bar where we serve some of the best specialty coffee in town.

While seating can be limited in our busy little house of free spirits, it's a environment where the music is often too loud and conversations with strangers lead to epic friendships.

Everyone is welcome. Bike or no bike.

settings.title: The Team
settings.desc:
When we say we're a small team, we mean it. We're less than a handful of people dedicate to quality products and service.
